GapFillDragDrop.Title: Modifiers: very, really, quite, not very
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word or phrase and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1. Big houses are veryexpensive.
2. Convenience food isn'tvery healthy.
3. I like my sofa, it's really comfortable.
4. Russia is very coldin winter.
5. My new teacher is quite friendly.
6. This book is really interesting.
7. Spain is quite hotin summer.
8. Traffic jams are veryboring.
9. My new car is quite fast.
10. His job isn't veryinteresting.
